group_1.narration: We parted ways with Mifuyu and headed@towards Hokuyo Ward, where Tsuruno@speculated the next swap would happen.

group_1.textLeft: I think they should be somewhere around@here, given the flow of things...

group_1.textRight: …I wonder why they're moving around@in a big circle…

group_1.textCenter: They're over there! I can sense them!

group_1.textLeft: Eh?!

group_1.textRight: Come on, let's go!
*Huff* *Huff* We found them.

group_1.textLeft: …They're really here.

group_1.textRight: …They discovered us sooner than I expected.

group_1.textLeft: Oh no! It's that strange place again…

group_1.textRight: ...Why are you switching locations and@items between worlds?
What on earth are you trying to do?

group_1.textLeft: I have no obligation to tell you.

group_1.textRight: ...Well, can we stop doing this?
For you two, it may be nothing@but an experiment.
But those things are precious to@the people who live here.
Take your revenge on us if you want…@But leave everyone else out of it.

group_1.textLeft: I think you've misunderstood something.
This isn't just about revenge@against you guys.

group_1.textRight: What…then…why?
It's to put an end to all evil.

group_1.textLeft: I come from the same world as you.
I decided to use this world to realize@that person's ideal.

group_1.textRight: But why bother with this world…?
This is the place where Iroha and@everyone else lives, not us.

group_1.textLeft: That's because I summoned her here.

group_1.textRight: Let's go to the next place, okay Senpai?

group_1.textLeft: …Sure.
Your magic really does come in handy.

group_1.textRight: No, no. It's because of you that I can@connect us to our base.
Since I can move any target instantaneously@with my magic,
we can have several bases around Kamihama.
Even if those people try to chase us,@they won't catch us so easily.

group_1.textLeft: Although it would be better if things@were a little more convenient.

group_1.narration: "I'd much prefer having a warp that could@directly connect us to another place."
"But no matter what we do,@we can't move elsewhere without passing@through this zone. While it's perfect for@escaping or trapping enemies..."

group_1.textLeft: Well, I can't say it's a bad thing. It's a crucial@part of our plan to eliminate evil.
You have the power to transport things and@I can make bridges to alternate dimensions.
I knew that if those two powers were@combined, no one could beat us.
I can't believe we can even swap things@between different worlds.

group_1.textRight: Yes, although it's gonna take a while,@since it uses up magic.
If we keep this up, we can flip this whole@world upside down just as you planned.

group_1.textLeft: ...But they're being a nuisance.
…I knew I should've killed them back then.

group_1.textRight: ...You don't have to kill them.

group_1.textLeft: But we can't let them get in our way. We have@to stop them before they can try anything.
We've already come this far. You can't just@back out of the plan now.

group_1.textRight: Don't worry… I'm resolved to make a world@free of evil for my senpai.

group_1.textLeft: For me, and your old senpai.
…It's funny how similar she and I ended up,@both in aim and our appearances.

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* It must be our destiny.@Mine and Senpai's.

group_1.narration: "From the moment I met her,@she was my only place in the world.@My role model and the center@of my universe."

group_1.textLeft: Wow, it was nice to have something@like that at school.

group_1.textRight: But I'd rather spend all my time with you.

group_1.textLeft: You can't say that…@You need to go to school.

group_1.narration: "When she became a Witch,@I lost my place in this world."
"Then that hateful creature showed up.@I thought about killing him,@but that wouldn't be right.@I decided to make a wish,@even if Senpai would've disapproved."
"I really wanted to bring her back to life,@but I knew better than anyone that@she wouldn't want that."
"Still…@I wanted to see her again so badly.@That's when I came up with an idea."
"I'd retrieve a version of Senpai from@another world, and then, with that 'Senpai',@we would create a world together@without any evil. A world where no one@has to become a Witch anymore."
"Then, I'm sure,@the real Senpai will forgive me."

group_1.textRight: (Right now, the girl before me is both@my senpai and not.)
(Still, her desire is the same...)

group_1.textLeft: …Where is this?@…That person…?
Ngh, who…?!
…I see. So you summoned me here@from another world.

group_1.textRight: …Please…forgive me.

group_1.textLeft: It's okay. I have no use for that world anymore.
…More importantly, you said you wanted@a world without evil, right?

group_1.textRight: That's right! Yes!@That's what I'm aiming for.

group_1.textLeft: Hm… I think I can help you with that.@That, too, is what I want more than anything.
…I mean, that's what that person@was aiming for too.
A peaceful world without evil.

group_1.narration: "For the sake of my Senpai, and for you,@I want to rid this world of evil!"

group_1.textRight: I would do anything for my Senpai.

group_1.textLeft: Is that so… It seems we have@the same idea. *Giggle*
Now then, let's commence our mission…@For a world without evil.

group_1.textRight: Yes… Yes, Senpai!
